name: MIDI Ball
description:
MIDI Ball is a party game where the players use a midi controller to play a basketball game. Each team controls four vertical bars using the midi controllers faders and a goalkeeper using a knob. With them they need to push a ball to the enemy goal area. It can use different midi controllers, it’s quick, fun and up to 4 players.

Credits:
Ignacio Puccini: Game Design & Programming
Mauro Barreca: Art & Design
Ignacio Quiroz: Music & SFX
MIDI Jack Library by Keijiro Takahashi.
